profile_positions.title: Secretary Policy Group International & Task Force Internationalisation, Strategy & Academic Affairs

profile_positions.description: I am managing the EuroScholars Program and also the EuroScholars Head Office at Leiden University. The EuroScholars Program is a unique research-based abroad program, for undergraduate / honors students from North American universities and colleges. The program is currently offered at 3 internationally renowned European Research Universities (Leiden University, KU Leuven and University of Geneva) who are also members of the LERU.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Head Office EuroScholars Program

profile_positions.description:
Managed and coordinated the application for the US "eligibility / deferment-only" certification. (Which we recently obtained).
In the past years I managed and coordinated the US Federal Aid Audit reports in cooperation with external auditers (KPMG and PwC).
Managed international student loans from the US, Canada and UK.
Financial management.
Responsible for transferring external policies and regulations into internal policies and procedures.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Foreign Loan Programmes

profile_positions.description:
Managed the LERU-STREAM programme at Leiden University.
I was also the project leader of this programme. Within this capacity I collaborated with 9 European universities in setting up the programme which is focussing on 3rd, 4th, and 5th year (exchange) students to conduct research in ongoing research projects at one of the participating European universities.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator LERU-STREAM (STudent ReseArch Mobility) Programme

profile_positions.description:

HRM.

Financial management of university and (inter)national scholarship programmes.
Financial management of the federal and private international student loan programmes (US, Canada, UK).
Responsible for transferring external policies and regulations into internal policies and procedures.
Responsible for internal and external marketing and promotional activities.

profile_positions.description:
During the reorganization and merger of our office (Leiden University Worldwide Programmes, LUWP) with the International Office, I was responsible for all HR related activities. 
I was one of the members of the Integral Employee Representation. In this capacity I also advised the organizational consultant on the proposed changes.  I advised on the occupancy rate of the departments to be reorganized and the associated tasks and functions. And I was the intermediary for the employees and the organizational consultant.
profile_positions.title: Deputy HR Employee

profile_positions.description:
I started my career in 1998 at the Leiden University Law Faculty (Office for International Programmes, "BIO"). During a reorganization, I temporarily worked at the Leiden University Worldwide Programmes (LUWP) Office in the same role:
Managed student applications for admission to international Master study programmes (Advanced LLM).
Set up internal policies and procedures.
Managed international scholarship programmes and financial management.
Marketing and promotional activities.
profile_positions.title: International Programmes / Admissions Officer
